title: Hiring a freelancer...
content:
Hi,

I've enjoyed looking over the website and I'm facinated by amount of knowledge you folks have.

I'm looking for a freelancer to help my small company - BlanchardGroup, and architectural firm that specializes in long range planning for educational instutions - rethink our workmark, and the typefaces we use on a day-to-day basis.

I would enjoy hearing from anyone interested, and seeing a few samples of your work - [jeff@blanchardgroup.com](mailto:jeff@blanchardgroup.com)

many thanks - Jeff
author: JB01
